author: cbs8
title: Automotive Heat Exchanger Market in APAC 2015-2019
text:
Reportlinker
About automotive heat exchanger
NEW YORK Heat exchanger transfers thermal energy from one medium to another. The medium is generally separated by a partition (usually of a metal). The automotive heat exchangers are incorporated with fins or corrugations to increase the surface area, thereby enhancing the heat exchange process.
Technavio's analysts forecast the automotive heat exchanger market in APAC to grow at a CAGR of 9.24% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the automotive heat exchanger market in APAC for the period 2015-2019. The market size has been calculated based on the revenue generated from the sales of automotive heat exchanger in APAC. The report presents five key vendors and a detailed analysis of these vendors. The automotive heat exchangers is segmented based on the types of heat exchanger. We also discuss market growth drivers, the challenges faced by vendors and the industry as a whole, as well as key trends emerging in the market.
Technavio's report, Automotive Heat Exchanger Market in APAC 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the landscape of the market and its growth prospects in the coming years. It also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
